rukus.text: emi? Niku teliyada (cudatam leda)? Niscayanga, bhumyakasalalo unna sarvamu mariyu rekkalu vippi egire paksulu saitam allah pavitratanu koniyadutu untayani? Vastavaniki pratidaniki tana namaj mariyu stotram cese pad'dhati telusu. Mariyu avi cesedanta allah ku baga telusu
mariyu bhumyakasala mida sarvadhipatyam allah de! Mariyu allah vaipunake (andariki) marali povalasi undi

emi? Niku teliyada (cudatam leda)? Niscayanga, allah ye meghalanu mellamellaga naduputu, vatini oka danito okati kaluputadani, a taruvata vatini progu cestadani! A pidapa vati nundi varsanni kuripincedi nivu custunnavu kada! Mariyu ayane akasanlo unna kondala vanti (meghala) nundi vadagandla callani (varsanni) tanu korina varipai kuripistadu. Mariyu tanu korina varini vati nundi tappistadu. Vati pidugu yokka merupu kanti cupulanu dadapu harincela untundi
allah ye reyimbavallanu marcutunnadu. Niscayanga, kannulu galavariki indulo gunapathamundi

mariyu allah prati pranini niti nundi srstincadu. Vatilo konni tama kadupu mida prakevi unnayi. Mariyu vatilo konni rendu kalla mida nadicevi unnayi. Mariyu vatilo marikonni nalugu (kalla) mida nadicevi unnayi. Allah tanu korina danini srstistadu. Niscayanga, allah pratidi ceyagala samardhudu
Vastavanga! Memu suspastamaina sucanalanu (ayat lanu) avatarimpajesamu. Mariyu allah tanu korina vaniki rjumargam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cestadu

varu (kapata visvasulu) antaru: "Memu allah nu mariyu sandesaharunni visvasincamu mariyu vidheyula mayyamu." Kani dani taruvata varilo oka vargam varu venu dirigi potaru. Mariyu alanti varu visvasincina varu karu
mariyu vari madhya tirpu ceyataniki, varini allah mariyu ayana sandesaharuni vaddaku pilicinappudu, variloni oka vargam varu mukham trippukuntaru
mariyu okavela tirpu (satyam) variki anukulamainadiga unte, varu vinamratato danini svikaristaru
emi? Vari hrdayalalo rogamunda? Leka varu sandehanlo padi poyara? Leka allah mariyu ayana sandesaharudu tamaku n'yayam ceyarani variki bhayama? Ala kadu! Asalu vare an'yayaparulu
